description: This page provides links to guidance produced by, or relating to, the Insolvency Service

details.body:
Debt relief options

  • Options for dealing with debts (interactive tool explaining some of the options available given your circumstances)
  • Options for paying off your debts
  • Getting a Debt Relief Order
  • Guide to Bankruptcy

Information for creditors

  • Options if you’re owed money
  • Claim money back from a bankrupt person or company in compulsory liquidation: guidance for creditors
  • Register as a creditor in a bankruptcy or liquidation
  • Apply to bankrupt someone who owes you money
  • Wind up a company that owes you money
  • Make and serve a statutory demand, or challenge one
  • How to wind up an insolvent partnership

Company insolvency

  • Options when a company is insolvent
  • Guide to liquidation (winding up) for directors (including reuse of a company name)
  • Re-use of company names

Company health check tools

  • Company health check: keeping your business on track
  • Fact sheet: Director’s loans accounts
  • Fact sheet: Bounce Back loans

Redundancy

  • Your rights if your employer is insolvent

Director disqualification

  • Company director disqualification
  • Corporate insolvency: effect of a disqualification order
  • Company Directors Disqualification Act 1986 and failed companies
  • Director disqualification: a guide to compensation orders
  • Search the register of disqualified company directors (includes outcomes information)

Restrictions orders and undertakings

  • Debt relief restrictions orders and undertakings
  • Bankruptcy restrictions orders and undertakings
  • Bankruptcy: Additional effects of a bankruptcy restrictions order or undertaking

Company investigations and enforcement

  • Live company investigations - what we do
  • Insolvent Company Investigations
  • Reporting misconduct by companies, directors and bankrupts to the Insolvency Service
  • Dissolved company investigations
  • Phoenix companies and the role of the Insolvency Service

Criminal enforcement

  • Going to court as a victim or witness
  • Get support as a victim of crime
  • Code of practice for victims of crime
  • Guidance for victims of crime

Legal Services Directorate

Insolvency Service Legal Services Directorate

General

  • The functions of a trustee or liquidator
  • Unfit conduct: how to find out if somebody is disqualified or subject to restrictions and why we took the action

change_history.note: Links added for: Director disqualification (compensation orders), disqualified director register, additional effects of a bankruptcy restrictions order, phoenix companies, legal services directorate, and unfit conduct,
New dissolved company investigations guidance added

available_translations.title: Guidance on personal debt relief options, company liquidation, investigation and enforcement.

Make a complaint to the Insolvency Service
